content.html: Although never the explicit goal, but teams that do code reviews tend to have far less issues with a bus-factor of one. Not to mention the discussions code reviews can spark, changing approaches etc. And yes, linting has its place: typically before the actual review.
content.value:
Although never the explicit goal, but teams that do code reviews tend to have far less issues with a bus-factor of one.

Not to mention the discussions code reviews can spark, changing approaches etc.

And yes, linting has its place: typically before the actual review.
